Articles.Content: What am I missing? I came, I fixed, I drove to waypoint, and am now smack dead on the waypoint, but the mission is not completing? Added probe core and solar panels. It just says "move the rover" and I moved it, drove it 2 km to the waypoint. What gives

Except that the waypoint is appearing in the map view and on the navball. It's just not mentioned in the contract as a note. Rebooting the game and doing the space center/tracking station trick doesn't fix the issue.

This mod

can show you the waypoints in flight view, not only in map view like in stock KSP. You could check if the waypoint is below ground.
Tried that, broke my game, all my contracts are now gone...  help

Deleted the mod, reset all my active contracts initially, managed to get back to my quicksave which appears stable. 

... is there some other way to check the position of the waypoint marker?
With all due respect, but I find it hard to believe that this mod, which has been used without problems for years by 1000s of players, would break your game.

And yet.. 

 

 

 

Suffered through 2 fantastically long steam cloud syncs to reinstall the mod just to allay your incredulity. Anyway, the active contracts are nuked by the mod install, consisting of simply dropping the mod folder into Game Data. Subsequently useless for trying to pull the waypoint of a contract it disappears. 

Edited February 19, 2021 by Overheal

49 minutes ago, Overheal said:

And yet.. 

 

 

 

Suffered through 2 fantastically long steam cloud syncs to reinstall the mod just to allay your incredulity. Anyway, the active contracts are nuked by the mod install, consisting of simply dropping the mod folder into Game Data. Subsequently useless for trying to pull the waypoint of a contract it disappears. 

How did you install the mod?  By hand or with CKAN?

What version of the game are you on?

Did you think to ask for help with the mod?

How about providing a log file for analysis?  Player.log is needed

and, this, which should be first, did you install the dependencies to the mod?

Finally, you really shouldn't be installing mods into your Steam GameData directory.  You should copy the entire game somewhere else, and then install mods there.  First, avoids the "fantastically long steam cloud syncs", second, nice to have a backup and a way to test and debug without messing with your main game.

I installed the mod by hand, version 1.11. 

I did not notice the dependencies previously, thanks for pointing it out.  Click blocker and toolbar manager are working but not the waypoint manager, unfortunately.  

Is there something else I can try to complete the mission?  Let's for the moment assume that it is in fact underground, even if we can't directly read the waypoint info. 

 

 

Edited February 20, 2021 by Overheal

Hit escape in game > show version information > contracts > active > hit complete on the contract to force complete it. You’ve done everything the contract asked for, so cheating it completed is justified in this case; just don’t do it too often

On 2/19/2021 at 10:19 PM, Overheal said:

I installed the mod by hand, version 1.11. 

I did not notice the dependencies previously, thanks for pointing it out.  Click blocker and toolbar manager are working but not the waypoint manager, unfortunately.  

Is there something else I can try to complete the mission?  Let's for the moment assume that it is in fact underground, even if we can't directly read the waypoint info. 

 

 

You still haven’t provided a log file, without which I can’t help you anymore.

On 2/20/2021 at 4:43 AM, jimmymcgoochie said:

Hit escape in game > show version information > contracts > active > hit complete on the contract to force complete it. You’ve done everything the contract asked for, so cheating it completed is justified in this case; just don’t do it too often 

Perfect, thank you.

On 2/20/2021 at 6:43 AM, jimmymcgoochie said:

Hit escape in game > show version information > contracts > active > hit complete on the contract to force complete it. You’ve done everything the contract asked for, so cheating it completed is justified in this case; just don’t do it too often 

Thank you! I had spent 3 hours on this donkey-loving contract, sent two cargo craft to Minmus, and was very proud of my solution. But it wouldn't complete. May the Game Gods smile upon you, kind person!
